user.title: Connect Connee Alarm
user.description: Enter your Ajax credentials to connect the alarm system. Data will transit through the Connee gateway exclusively for Home Assistant integration purposes.

data.accept_terms: I accept data processing through the Connee gateway

error.invalid_auth: Access denied. Check your credentials or that your account is activated by Connee.
error.no_hubs: No hubs found. Make sure you have accepted the invitation in the Ajax app.
error.terms_not_accepted: You must accept the terms to continue.
